## isPredefinedBlockNumber() function

Returns true if the provided blockNumber is 'latest', 'pending' or 'earliest

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isPredefinedBlockNumber(blockNumber: Quantity | Tag): blockNumber is Tag;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  blockNumber | [Quantity](./eth-connect.quantity.md) \| [Tag](./eth-connect.tag.md) | The given blocknumber |

**Returns:**

blockNumber is [Tag](./eth-connect.tag.md)
